GSD.description:
nvme: use struct group for generic command dwords

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 3d8b35387e01cab217dc4691a6f770cbb6ed852c. For more details please see the references link.
